Name: Valzar
About the game: Explore an uncharted land and recover the pieces of a broken amulet. Valzar is a tough arena action platformer with roguelike elements. Randomized levels full of humanlike enemies, grumpy gods, magic fruit, and mistakes. Key Features Encounter enemies that vary in intelligence and combat ability. Rivals move like a player and know all player spells. Explore randomized maps to find treasure, friends, rivals, gods, and bosses. Loot randomized spells, equipment, and curses. Worship gods that may not have your best interest in mindâ€”but with favor comes power. Identify and consume magic fruit and potions to augment your status and remove curses. Learn by doing. Discover the world's systems for advancement and safe travel. Difficult and replayable. Your actions matter. Every run is a new adventure with secrets to unlock.
